column2: chl.climatology = chl.all %>% mutate(month = lubridate::month(date, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE), miezi = lubridate::month(date)) %>% group_by(lon,lat, month, miezi) %>% summarise(chl = mean(chl, na.rm = TRUE))
aes(x = lon, y = lat, fill = log(chl)), interpolate = FALSE) +
aes(x = lon, y = lat, fill = log(chl)), interpolate = FALSE) +
cowplot::plot_grid(rain, dry, nrow = 1, labels = c("a)", "b)"), label_size = 12, label_fontface = "plain", label_x = .15, label_y = .90)
